Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 98th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1982...
Injured on 5/7/1987 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/19/1989...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/7/1995 to a 3-year deal worth $2,140,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1997...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/11/1998 to a 1-year deal worth $816,000 per year...
